hints.raw_directive:
4854: ## Section 4: Exponential Convergence
4855: 
4856: :::{prf:theorem} Exponential KL Convergence
4857: :label: thm-exp-convergence-standalone
4858: 
4859: For the iterated dynamics $\mu_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(\mu_t)$:
4860: 
4861: $$
4862: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty
4863: $$
4864: 
4865: where:
4866: $$
4867: \lambda = \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})
4868: $$
4869: 
4870: and:
4871: $$
4872: C_\infty = \frac{C_{\text{total}}}{\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}}
4873: $$

hints.label: proof-exp-convergence-standalone
hints.content:
4878: :label: proof-exp-convergence-standalone
4879: 
4880: **Step 1**: Iterate the contraction from Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-composition-standalone`:
4881: 
4882: Let $\epsilon := \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})$. Then:
4883: 
4884: $$
4885: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \epsilon) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}}
4886: $$
4887: 
4888: **Step 2**: Unroll the recursion:
4889: 
4890: $$
4891: \begin{aligned}
4892: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \epsilon)^t D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} \sum_{k=0}^{t-1} (1 - \epsilon)^k \\
4893: &= (1 - \epsilon)^t D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} \frac{1 - (1 - \epsilon)^t}{\epsilon}
4894: \end{aligned}
4895: $$
4896: 
4897: **Step 3**: Take the limit $t \to \infty$:
4898: 
4899: $$
4900: \lim_{t \to \infty} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq \frac{C_{\text{total}}}{\epsilon} = C_\infty
4901: $$
4902: 
4903: **Step 4**: Approximate $(1 - \epsilon)^t$:
4904: 
4905: For small $\epsilon = \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})$:
4906: 
4907: $$
4908: (1 - \epsilon)^t = e^{t \log(1 - \epsilon)} \approx e^{-\epsilon t} = e^{-\lambda t}
4909: $$
4910: 
4911: where $\lambda = \epsilon$.
4912: 
4913: **Step 5**: Final bound:
4914: 
4915: $$
4916: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty \left(1 - e^{-\lambda t}\right) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty
4917: $$
4918:
